title: The Midnight Cry
info:
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
        The Midnight Cry
         by Christofori
              - a -
          Funky Brains
         - Production -
     -=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
      >>   03.31.2002   <<
     -=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
      Please play this tune
      in the ModPlug Player
    with the Max Polyphony set
     to at least 64 (266 mhz)
     Also play this tune with
        Surround enabled!
     -=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
      Genre: Dance/SynthPop
       Running Time:  3:38
      Format: 34-channel IT
      (using up to about 62
        virtual channels)
     -=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
    This is my first tune for
   Funky Brains, hope you like
 it!  The melody and inspiration
  for this track came to me one
     day while I was driving
    back to school from home..
     I finally decided to do
   something with it!  Enjoy!!
     -=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
  Greets and Hello's go out to
   Gargoyle and Cryssalid (my
   partners in crime!) as well
  as Libris (I've not forgotten
   about Triumph!), AcidSoul,
   DreamSectioN, grl, warhawk
   (wish you hadn't quit irc,
   or that you'd come back!),
   AcidDose, BardCat, as well
 as many more from #modarchive!
  (Sorry, I know I'm probably
   forgetting some of you...)
   Also greets and thanks go
   as well to all the people
   that are listening to this
    tune, and those who have
    heard any of my others!
     -=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
    You can find this and all
   of my other tunes online at
   www.modarchive.com and also
       at www.modplug.com!
  Also, check out my home page:
  www.acidsoul.co.uk/Christofori
     -=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
 Contact me by E-Mail at:
                gentalon@aol.com
 or by Snail:     Chris Molyneux
                      720 W. 8th
                  Ada, OK  74820
   (Snail address will be good
     until around May 2002.)
     -=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
   >> Thanks for listening! <<
     -=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
